mapper.sql: id AS "id" , user_code AS "userCode" , mobile_number AS "mobileNumber" , is_mobile_verified AS "isMobileVerified" , mobile_operator AS "mobileOperator" , login_pwd AS "loginPwd" , user_status AS "userStatus" , user_status_change_cause AS "userStatusChangeCause" , user_status_change_date AS "userStatusChangeDate" , register_channel AS "registerChannel" , user_nickname AS "userNickname" , user_name AS "userName" , user_sex AS "userSex" , user_birthday AS "userBirthday" , user_level AS "userLevel" , user_activeness AS "userActiveness" , register_ip AS "registerIp" , user_picture AS "userPicture" , user_type AS "userType" , id_type AS "idType" , id_number AS "idNumber" , imei AS "imei" , operating_system AS "operatingSystem" , operating_system_version AS "operatingSystemVersion" , device_brand AS "deviceBrand" , device_model AS "deviceModel" , user_agent AS "userAgent" , last_access_date AS "lastAccessDate" , create_date AS "createDate" , update_date AS "updateDate" , delete_date AS "deleteDate" , user_account AS "userAccount" , user_email AS "userEmail" , is_email_verified AS "isEmailVerified"

sql.set: id = #{id}, user_code = #{userCode}, mobile_number = #{mobileNumber}, is_mobile_verified = #{isMobileVerified}, mobile_operator = #{mobileOperator}, login_pwd = #{loginPwd}, user_status = #{userStatus}, user_status_change_cause = #{userStatusChangeCause}, user_status_change_date = #{userStatusChangeDate}, register_channel = #{registerChannel}, user_nickname = #{userNickname}, user_name = #{userName}, user_sex = #{userSex}, user_birthday = #{userBirthday}, user_level = #{userLevel}, user_activeness = #{userActiveness}, register_ip = #{registerIp}, user_picture = #{userPicture}, user_type = #{userType}, id_type = #{idType}, id_number = #{idNumber}, imei = #{imei}, operating_system = #{operatingSystem}, operating_system_version = #{operatingSystemVersion}, device_brand = #{deviceBrand}, device_model = #{deviceModel}, user_agent = #{userAgent}, last_access_date = #{lastAccessDate}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, delete_date = #{deleteDate}, user_account = #{userAccount}, user_email = #{userEmail}, is_email_verified = #{isEmailVerified},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_usr_user ( id, user_code, mobile_number, is_mobile_verified, mobile_operator, login_pwd, user_status, user_status_change_cause, user_status_change_date, register_channel, user_nickname, user_name, user_sex, user_birthday, user_level, user_activeness, register_ip, user_picture, user_type, id_type, id_number, imei, operating_system, operating_system_version, device_brand, device_model, user_agent, last_access_date, create_date, update_date, delete_date, user_account, user_email, is_email_verified ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userCode}, #{mobileNumber}, #{isMobileVerified}, #{mobileOperator}, #{loginPwd}, #{userStatus}, #{userStatusChangeCause}, #{userStatusChangeDate}, #{registerChannel}, #{userNickname}, #{userName}, #{userSex}, #{userBirthday}, #{userLevel}, #{userActiveness}, #{registerIp}, #{userPicture}, #{userType}, #{idType}, #{idNumber}, #{imei}, #{operatingSystem}, #{operatingSystemVersion}, #{deviceBrand}, #{deviceModel}, #{userAgent}, #{lastAccessDate}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteDate}, #{userAccount}, #{userEmail}, #{isEmailVerified} )
